term.title: sedimentation velocity

item.text: Velocity of a component in a fluid relative to the fluid in the direction of gravitational or centrifugal acceleration. Also called sedimentation rate.

sources.item: PAC, 1994, 66, 897. 'Quantities and units for centrifugation in the clinical laboratory (IUPAC Recommendations 1994)' on page 904 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199466040897)
